name: Star
text:
Star
Star was a young man that Dale Cooper encountered in the summer of 1969.
Biography
Cooper encountered Star and his companion April on July 30, 1969 as he traveled back on foot after a boy scouts' jamboree. They drove a VW bus and were on their way to Washington, D.C. to chain themselves to the door of the Pentagon and allowed Dale to stay with them for part of the trip.
After Cooper left them, they eventually reached the Pentagon, but had a fight and parted ways.
